summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2566, for the improvement of Spokane Street and West Spokane Street, from 1st Avenue South to Klickitat Avenue, and from Indiana Avenue to 28th Avenue Southwest; all in the City of Seattle, by making repairs to the existing bridge and laying a top of asphalt or other suitable material; under Ordinance No. 29879 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
